verses.name: Luke 24:43
verses.text: And he took it, and did eat before them.

verses.name: Luke 24:44
verses.text: And he said unto them, These are the words which I spake unto you, while I was yet with you, that all things must be fulfilled, which were written in the law of Moses, and in the prophets, and in the psalms, concerning me.

verses.name: Luke 24:45
verses.text: Then opened he their understanding, that they might understand the scriptures,

verses.name: Luke 24:46
verses.text: And said unto them, Thus it is written, and thus it behoved Christ to suffer, and to rise from the dead the third day:
